name: @redis-x/client
description: Enhanced redis client build on top of "redis" package.

scripts.build: bun run compile && rm -rf dist && bun run build-cjs && bun run tools/fix-esbuild.js
scripts.coverage: bun run redis-up && bun run compile && bun test --coverage
scripts.npm-publish: bun run build && bunx eslint . && bun run test && bun run types && npm publish --tag latest ; bun run types-delete ; bun run redis-down
scripts.npm-publish-beta: bun run build && bunx eslint . && bun run test && bun run types && npm publish --tag beta ; bun run types-delete ; bun run redis-down
scripts.redis-up: docker ps | grep test-redis >/dev/null || docker run --rm -d -p 16379:6379 --name test-redis redis:7-alpine
scripts.test: bun run redis-up && bun run compile && bun test && npm run test-node
scripts.types: bun run build && bun run types-delete && bunx tsc
scripts.types-delete: rm $(mktemp) $(find . -type f | grep .d.ts | grep -v node_modules) ; rm -rf types src/types

author: Daniil Kirichenko (https://twitter.com/kirickme)
